channel.title: [562] Client Help - Rep++ For Help
channel.description:
Hello, I'm having trouble with my, and [b]several[/b] other 562 Clients. I know for sure it's not the server, it's indeed the client because I tried three different servers using each of the clients I have on each of them.
The problem is, 9 out of every 10 times I try to connect to the server using a 562 Client, it says "Error_Game_JS5Connect", and the other time it connects (The 1 out of 10). So I know it's not the Cache because it still connects. How can I prevent the Client from having to load [b]So many[/b] times before it actually connecting? How can I make it connect, straight to the server without this error the [b]First[/b] time I try?
I'll Rep++ For [b]Help[/b] on fixing this error or if you have a Link to a 562 Client, because I constantly use the search button and no clients I found have this error fixed.

item.title: [562] Client Help - Rep++ For Help
item.dc:creator: @redweakling redweakling
item.description:
@redweakling wrote:

happens to me too sometimes, more like 1/3 times for me, but for everyone else it seems to work fine…

Read full topic

item.title: [562] Client Help - Rep++ For Help
item.dc:creator: @asoka asoka
item.description:
@asoka wrote:

no its not i own a server and thats not the case this time, im getting the same error,

usally it has to do with the server being offline etc,

but this time its the 562 server it wont load when i run server then client

its the client when i hit run i get the error js5connect sometimes it lets me connect

other times it wont i have no idea but it wont let me for some reason please help

bump1!@#@!#!@#!@

Read full topic

item.title: [562] Client Help - Rep++ For Help
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“QuestMaster 2K10, post:1, topic:370663”]Hello, I’m having trouble with my, and several other 562 Clients. I know for sure it’s not the server, it’s indeed the client because I tried three different servers using each of the clients I have on each of them.

The problem is, 9 out of every 10 times I try to connect to the server using a 562 Client, it says “Error_Game_JS5Connect”, and the other time it connects (The 1 out of 10). So I know it’s not the Cache because it still connects. How can I prevent the Client from having to load So many times before it actually connecting? How can I make it connect, straight to the server without this error the First time I try?

I’ll Rep++ For Help on fixing this error or if you have a Link to a 562 Client, because I constantly use the search button and no clients I found have this error fixed.[/quote]

The “error_game_js5connect” error is something to do with not having the server running before executing the client. Just to clarify; 9 times out of 10 do you run the client first?

Read full topic
